    • useEffect

      public void useEffect(PlayerActionPhase currentPlayerActionPhase, Island island, Color color, List<Color> srcColors, List<Color> dstColors) throws InvalidCharacterException, StudentNotOnTheCardException, InvalidActionException, InvalidStudentException, EmptyBagException
      Uses the correct effect of one MovingCharacter accordingly to its name and moves the scrStudents to the correct destination
      Specified by:
      useEffect in class Character
      Parameters:
      currentPlayerActionPhase - the PlayerActionPhase which the effect is used in
      island - the Island which the Character affects
      color - the Color which the Character affects
      srcColors - the students to be moved to the destination
      dstColors - the students to be moved to the source (only if the effect is a "swap" effect)
      Throws:
      InvalidCharacterException - if the Character is not valid
      StudentNotOnTheCardException - if the Student is not on the card
      InvalidActionException - if the action is not valid
      InvalidStudentException - if the Student is not valid
      EmptyBagException - if the Bag is empty

    • fillCardFromBag

      public void fillCardFromBag() throws EmptyBagException
      Fills the selected Character with the correct number of students from the Bag
      Throws:
      EmptyBagException - if the Bag is empty

    • swapStudents

      private void swapStudents(Place src, Place dst, ArrayList<Student> srcStudents, ArrayList<Student> dstStudents) throws InvalidActionException, InvalidStudentException
      Moves the scrStudents from the src to the dst and viceversa
      Parameters:
      src - the scource of scrStudents
      dst - the destination of srcStudents
      srcStudents - the students to be moved from the stc to the dst
      dstStudents - the students to be moved from the dst to the scr
      Throws:
      InvalidActionException - if the action is not valid
      InvalidStudentException - it the student is not valid

    • moveStudentAwayFromCard

      private void moveStudentAwayFromCard(Place destination, List<Color> srcColors) throws StudentNotOnTheCardException, InvalidActionException, InvalidStudentException
      Moves the scrStudents to the destination
      Parameters:
      destination - the destination to move the students to
      srcColors - the colors of the students to be moved
      Throws:
      StudentNotOnTheCardException - if the Student is not on the Character
      InvalidActionException - if the action is not valid
      InvalidStudentException

    • getStudentListFromColorList

      private ArrayList<Student> getStudentListFromColorList(List<Color> colors, Place source) throws StudentNotOnTheCardException, InvalidActionException
      Returns an ArrayList of students from a List of colors
      Parameters:
      colors - the List of colors given
      source - the Place to get the correct students from
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of students from a List of colors
      Throws:
      StudentNotOnTheCardException - if the Student is not on the card
      InvalidActionException - if the given List of colors is invalid

    • giveStudent

      public void giveStudent(Place destination, Student student) throws InvalidStudentException, InvalidActionException
      Description copied from interface: Place
      Transfers a student to the destination. The student will no longer be present in the object which this method is called on.
      Specified by:
      giveStudent in interface Place
      Parameters:
      destination - Place which the method gives the student to
      student - The student given to the destination
      Throws:
      InvalidStudentException
      InvalidActionException
